name: Platform
description: You summon a 1 by 1 unit platform in an unoccupied tile within a short (10 unit) distance. While you concentrate on this spell, you can use a subsequent action to move the platform 5 units as if it had a fly speed, bringing with it any creature that is standing on it.
charge: The platform becomes 2 by 2 units and the fly speed is upgraded to 8 units.
